memories.title: My Beautiful Puchku
memories.date: The one who stole my heart
memories.message: Every moment with you feels like a dream I never want to wake up from.

memories.title: My Sunshine
memories.message: Your smile is the first thing I think of every morning.

memories.title: My Everything
memories.message: You make every ordinary moment extraordinary.

memories.title: My Princess
memories.message: You look like a dream come true in every picture.

memories.title: My Traditional Queen
memories.message: Your beauty takes my breath away every single time.

memories.title: My Cutie
memories.message: I fall for you more with each passing day.

loveLetter.body: Ek pyari si gulab ke liye ek chota sa effort..... mai chahta hun ki aap ek gulab ki tarah hamesha hasti aur khilti rahe ...hamesha khudh rahe aur iss mali ko ek mauka de voh aapki dekhbhaal kr ske aapka khayal rakhe kyun usse bss ye chahiye ki aap hamesha uske sath rhe kabhi murjhaye nai kyunki aap uski zindagi m khushiya lati h aur voh mali mai hee hun.....I want you be the Rose of my life......ğŸŒ¹â¤ï¸

heartMessage: I will be with you forever I promise and i will never change or regret my decisions I promise you
